members.name: San Cayetano Bakery
members.address: 2456 San Martín Ave, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Traditional artisan bakery and pastry shop in downtown Varela, famous for its freshly baked croissants since 1985.

members.name: Happy Hardware Store
members.address: 3120 Eva Perón Ave, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Neighborhood hardware store offering a wide variety of tools, paints, electrical and plumbing supplies. Home delivery available for professionals.

members.name: Don Pedro Supermarket
members.address: 985 Sallares Street, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Family-owned supermarket with over 30 years of history in the neighborhood. Offers fresh produce, groceries, and cleaning products.

members.name: Varela Fitness Gym
members.address: 230 Monteagudo Street, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Modern gym offering functional training, weightlifting, crossfit, and pilates classes. Open Monday through Saturday.

members.name: Il Viale Ice Cream Shop
members.address: 5120 Calchaquí Ave, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Artisan ice creams made with traditional Italian recipes. Home delivery available in Varela and surrounding areas. Known for its 'Dulce de Leche Granizado' flavor.

members.name: Huellas Veterinary Clinic
members.address: 150 Las Heras Street, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Veterinary care, pet shop, and boarding service. Personalized attention and trusted professionals for your pets.

members.name: Varela South Motors
members.address: 10550 Hipólito Yrigoyen Ave, Florencio Varela, Buenos Aires
members.description: Official multi-brand dealership. Sales of new and used cars, financing options, and same-day vehicle registration.
